{{also|抱佛脚}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=抱佛脚|lit=to grab Buddha's foot}}

===Etymology===
Short for the following saying:
:{{zh-x|平時 不 燒香，臨時 抱佛腳。|Never burning incense when all is well, but '''clasping Buddha’s feet''' when one is in trouble.}}

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=bàofójiǎo
|c=pou5 fat6 goek3
|mn=phāu-hu̍t-kha/phō-pu̍t-kha
|cat=id
}}

===Idiom===
{{zh-idiom}}

# to [[leave]] something to do at the [[last minute]]; to make a [[last-minute]] [[effort]]
# {{lb|zh|rare}} to [[profess]] [[Buddhism]]
